Windlord/Nightlight::


"I'll send you my coordinates and Chivtrons' signatures"said Windlord 
while he fired 5 times agains MCGowan, 5 against and 15 agaisnt 
Virgo."Situation is pretty bad to us... They are shooting against 
Sarge, several of us is wounded, two in stasis lock...  We really 
need your help"
